Posts.Content: Hi.. my mother was just diagnosed with IDC with nercosis.  Her Bloom and Richardson score is 7.  A year ago her mammogram was normal and now here we are a year later with this news.  Can anyone give me any information on this please?
Posts.Title: New -- IDC with Nercosis

Posts.Content: I have looked over my mothers biopsy in more detail and this is what it is saying:
Posts.Title: High Ki67 and P53, Triple Negative?
